Package com.amonson.node_monitoring

Class NodeMonitoring

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amonson.node_monitoring.NodeMonitoring
  • public class NodeMonitoring
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to participate in a cluster as a mesh where all nodes are monitored to be active or missing by every other node.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  NodeMonitoring.MessageHandler
      The functional interface for registered incoming messages.
      static interface  NodeMonitoring.NodeEventHandler
      Functional interface for online/offline events for remote nodes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NodeMonitoring

        public NodeMonitoring​(java.lang.String myHostname,
                      java.lang.String[] allHostnames,
                      NodeMonitoring.NodeEventHandler eventCallback,
                      java.util.logging.Logger logger)
        ctor to create a new monitoring class. This will consume 4 threads, but they are mostly lightweight.
        Parameters:
        myHostname - This nodes hostname (must be network resolvable)
        allHostnames - The array of hostnames in this cluster. It must be the complete list.
        eventCallback - Called when the online/offline state of a remote node changes.
        logger - The logger used to log warnings, errors, or debug information.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the networking cannot correctly navigate the local NICs.

      • NodeMonitoring

        public NodeMonitoring​(java.lang.String myHostname,
                      java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> allHostnames,
                      NodeMonitoring.NodeEventHandler eventCallback,
                      java.util.logging.Logger logger)
        ctor to create a new monitoring class. This will consume 4 threads, but they are mostly lightweight.
        Parameters:
        myHostname - This nodes hostname (must be network resolvable)
        allHostnames - The collection of hostnames in this cluster. It must be the complete list.
        eventCallback - Called when the online/offline state of a remote node changes.
        logger - The logger used to log warnings, errors, or debug information.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the networking cannot correctly navigate the local NICs.

    • Method Detail

      • addHandler

        public NodeMonitoring.MessageHandler addHandler​(java.lang.String topic,
                                                NodeMonitoring.MessageHandler handler)
        Adds a new MessageHandler callback for the specified topic. This will not overwrite an entry.
        Parameters:
        topic - The topic to add the callback handler for.
        handler - The callback to call when a message is received for the specified topic.
        Returns:
        The current value is already set or null if the handler was added.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - is topic is null or 'alive'. Also thrown when the handler is null.

      • removeHandler

        public NodeMonitoring.MessageHandler removeHandler​(java.lang.String topic)
        Removes a previously added MessageHandler for a specific topic.
        Parameters:
        topic - The topic to remove.
        Returns:
        The removed handler or null if the the topic was not found.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - is topic is null or 'alive'.

      • setPort

        public void setPort​(int port)
        Set the port for this node monitoring object. Must be set before calling startMonitoring.
        Parameters:
        port - The port to bind to and listen on.

      • startMonitoring

        public void startMonitoring()
        If not running this will start the monitoring threads. This can only be called once per instance.

      • stopMonitoring

        public void stopMonitoring()
        If running this will stop the monitoring threads.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage​(java.lang.String topic,
                        java.lang.String message)
        Send a message to all other nodes in this participating in the monitoring cluster.
        Parameters:
        topic - The topic to send the message for.
        message - The message to publish.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - is topic is null or 'alive'. Also thrown when the message is null.

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        Test if the monitoring is running.
        Returns:
        true when the monitoring is running, false otherwise.

      • waitForMonitoring

        public void waitForMonitoring()
                       throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Wait indefinitly or until an interrupt occurs while for the monitoring thread.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If interrupted while waiting.
